name: Hyundai Venue
description: The price of Hyundai Venue, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 7.94  - 13.48 Lakh. It is available in 24 variants, with engine options ranging from 998 to 1493 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Venue comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Venue has a ground clearance of 195 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.5 to 23.4 kmpl for Venue.
